trans-unit.source: Validates that an object is a derived class of a specified type.
trans-unit.target: 驗證物件指定類型的衍生的類別。

trans-unit.source: The SubclassTypeValidator class is used to ensure that an object meets specific criteria.
trans-unit.target: SubclassTypeValidator 類別用來確保物件符合特定準則。

trans-unit.source: The criteria for validation is established when an instance of the SubclassTypeValidator class is created.
trans-unit.target: 建立 SubclassTypeValidator 類別的執行個體時，會建立驗證準則。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.SubclassTypeValidator.CanValidate%2A> method determines whether the type of the object being validated is in fact a <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.SubclassTypeValidator.CanValidate%2A>方法會判斷要驗證之物件的類型是否確實是<xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Configuration.SubclassTypeValidator.CanValidate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object being validated is passed as a parameter of the <xref:System.Configuration.SubclassTypeValidator.Validate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 正在驗證的物件會傳遞做為參數的<xref:System.Configuration.SubclassTypeValidator.Validate%2A>方法。</xref:System.Configuration.SubclassTypeValidator.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method first verifies that the object to validate is not `null`, and then verifies that the object is a derived class of the expected type.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會先確認要驗證的物件不是`null`，，然後確認 此物件是在衍生的類別是預期的類型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.SubclassTypeValidator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Configuration.SubclassTypeValidator"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The criteria for validation is based on the `baseClass` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 驗證的準則根據`baseClass`參數。

trans-unit.source: The base class to validate against.
trans-unit.target: 若要以驗證基底類別。

trans-unit.source: baseClass is .
trans-unit.target: baseClassis .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an object can be validated based on type.
trans-unit.target: 判斷是否可以根據類型驗證物件。

trans-unit.source: The CanValidate method determines whether the type of the object being validated is in fact a <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: CanValidate 方法可讓您判斷要驗證之物件的類型是否確實是<xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The object type.
trans-unit.target: 物件類型。

trans-unit.source: if the type parameter matches a type that can be validated; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 type 參數必須符合的型別，可以進行驗證，否則 。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the value of an object is valid.
trans-unit.target: 判斷物件的值是否有效。

trans-unit.source: When an instance of the <xref:System.Configuration.SubclassTypeValidator> class is created, the base class is provided and used as evaluation criteria.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體時<xref:System.Configuration.SubclassTypeValidator>類別建立，是提供基底類別，並將其做為評估準則。</xref:System.Configuration.SubclassTypeValidator>

trans-unit.source: The object to validate is passed as a parameter of the Validate method.
trans-unit.target: 要驗證的物件會傳遞做為驗證方法的參數。

trans-unit.source: This method performs the validation check between the base class and the parameter object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會執行基底類別與參數物件之間的驗證檢查。

trans-unit.source: The object value.
trans-unit.target: 物件值。

trans-unit.source: value is not of a that can be derived from baseClass as defined in the constructor.
trans-unit.target: value不是可以衍生自baseClass建構函式中所定義。
